From Biology to Web Devolopment

My recent interest in programming and my background in biology motivated me to reshape my career into a more technical path. I have done masters in Molecular Biology, durring my research work i was analysing some data with bioinformatics tools which attract me to the world of programing. My goals are to become a good web devolper and Data scientist on concetration of Bioinformatics. For now Developing new web and mobile App for Biologist is just a fantasy but every thing is posible if you put your blood, sweat and energy in order to achive some thing.
